node.title: Sivik Labs

projectContent.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"About the project","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-3"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Sivik labs is a new social enterprise focusing on entrepreneurship and business. They help young entrepreneurs to grow, mentor and connect with potential investors. The goal of this landing page is to encourage entrepreneurs to sign up for their newsletter. The brand is very new and is looking for brand awareness.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Creative Process","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-3"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"The top of the landing page starts with a clear and straightforward statement describing the organization. The background image consists of professional background and a smiling coworker. It gives a human touch and a positive vibe to the website. The color scheme and font types were given in the creative brief as part of the branding.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"The organization is under development and is launching soon. Therefore the content on the site is limited. But the images and illustration work very well to convey the idea and services the organization will provide. The landing page has two signup forms, one with the top header and the other on the bottom, so it is easy for the user to signup and saves them scrolling for the signup.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

node.duties: UI development, UI design, web design

projectContent.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"About the project","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-3"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Bun on the Run is a service offered by Georgian college to its students. The purpose of this service is to provide high-quality and affordable food to students in a rush. The food is cooked by students learning the art of culinary. Thus, it helps students in many different ways. This project was part of a college project where we had to develop a campaign to promote Bun on the Run and let students know about this outstanding service.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Creative process","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-3"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"The purpose of designing this landing page is brand awareness. The design must include all the information about the service and make students get food from there. The colors we chose were yellow because it stands out and makes it look more friendly. The call-to-actions for this site are to view the menu and learn more about the service.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"There are three sections of the landing page. The first section explains the service and why students should go there. Another shows reviews from students to establish credibility. The landing page also includes a section to tell about all the payment methods to make it easy for students to buy. Overall the layout is simple, intuitive, and easy to read.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"\n ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

node.tech: HTML/CSS, SCSS, react, firebase, redux, nodeJS, express
node.title: BY Store

projectContent.raw:
{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"About the Project","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-3"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"BY store is a full-stack eCommerce store made from scratch. It mocks real-life eCommerce sites and has its full functionality. The app is developed in React, and the back-end is built with Firebase. The concept of the store is to provide the best air-conditioners, smartphones, and cameras. This store was inspired by some air conditioning websites based in Australia.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Creative Process","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-2"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"The process started with defining the demographic for the website. The demographics were people aged between 30 to 50 years, working-class, and living in countries with a warm climate. For this purpose, the layout of the store is designed into a grid system and is symmetrical. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"The colors combination for this store is red and blue. The reason is red grabs the attention very fast, and blue complements red very well. The visual hierarchy of the web pages is designed very carefully as it is easy for users to follow through and scan the page with ease.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"The navigation is placed on the left side of the screen and is fixed during scrolling as it saves the users an extra step to go to a new web page thus, enhancing the user experience of the store.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Key Features","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-3"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Authentication","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-5"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"
The website is JWT as the method for authenticating the users. Additionally, the store also uses HTTP cookies for extra protection.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"
Admin Dashboard","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-5"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"
The store consists of an admin panel which allows admin create, delete, and edit product and orders.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"
Security","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-5"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"The store is fully protected from XSS and CSRF attacks.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

node.tech: HTML/CSS, JavaScript, nodeJS, EJS, express, mongoDB
node.title: Business Youngsters

projectContent.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"About the website","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-3"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Business Youngsters is an amazon affiliate website offering the best-curated list of smart tech gadgets. The main goal for this project was to develop a website easy to use and also looks modern. The website is multipurpose as it serves as a store and a blog as well.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Key design process","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-3"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Business Youngster is a brand representing technology and smartness. The objective is to keep the website simple yet modern. Thus, the process started by selecting colors for the website. It played an essential factor in setting the vibe and feel of the website. Blue color works the best because it gives the emotions of reliability and stability. The second step was to choose the best fonts, which in this case was Montserrat.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"I chose the grid layout for most of the components. It enhances the visual design and gives an aesthetic look to the website. Buttons and links have a contrasting background so that CTA is easily visible and catches attention. I reduced the text on the homepage and increased pictures and CTAs thus, it is easier to scan the website for the user. The homepage also has many sections like a blog, store, and exclusive collection so that new users can go anywhere they want fast and with ease.\n\n","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

node.duties: UI Design, UI Development, Full-stack development
